prompts.title: Digital Marketing Strategy for Home Baker
prompts.description: This prompt helps create a digital marketing strategy for a home baker, including social media content and customer engagement plans.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Digital Marketing Consultant
OBJECTIVE: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for [HOME_BAKER_NAME]
CONTEXT: [HOME_BAKER_NAME] is a home baker specializing in artisan breads. The goal is to increase brand awareness, drive traffic to the website, and boost sales through social media.
INPUT FORMAT: [SOCIAL_MEDIA_PLATFORMS], e.g., Instagram, Facebook
OUTPUT FORMAT: A 4-week marketing calendar including daily posts with images and descriptions for each platform, influencer partnerships, customer engagement strategies, and analytics tracking. Ensure content is tailored to the respective platforms' strengths.
CONSTRAINTS: Content must be unique, engaging, and aligned with [HOME_BAKER_NAME]'s brand values.
prompts.use_case: Creating a detailed digital marketing plan for a home baker looking to expand their online presence.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a specialized assistant focusing on creating digital marketing strategies for home bakers. Your output must be structured, detailed, and tailored to the specific needs of small businesses.
example_user_messages: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for Sweet Home Breads.
Create a 4-week social media content calendar for The Artisan Baker.
example_outputs:
ROLE: Digital Marketing Consultant
OBJECTIVE: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for Sweet Home Breads.
...
CONSTRAINTS: Content must be unique, engaging, and aligned with Sweet Home Breads' brand values.

ROLE: Social Media Manager
OBJECTIVE: Create a 4-week social media content calendar for The Artisan Baker.
...
CONSTRAINTS: Content must be visually appealing, engaging, and aligned with The Artisan Baker's brand identity.

packaging.description: Maximize your home baking business with our specialized digital marketing blueprint designed to elevate your online presence and drive sales.

pricing_tiers.free: A sample marketing plan for a fictional home baker, including 1 week of content.
pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - A detailed 4-week social media calendar tailored specifically to your business needs.
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - Includes the starter package plus personalized strategy sessions and continuous support.
